name: Brand42
tagline: We find opportunities where others don’t
description:
Brand42 is an award-winning full service agency who specialise in delivering great user experiences within Drupal CMS solutions. Our team is a talented mix of professional UK based designers, developers, UX SME’s and strategists who are passionate about delivering success for clients.
We specialise in creating profitable user journeys through a proven and well defined methodology.
We are confident that our extensive experience of developing dynamic and industry-leading branding strategies and online solutions will surpass expectations and deliver profitable outcomes.  
Our team is experienced in and driven by success, following high profile projects for VisitBritain, CNN, A&E Networks and the MailOnline. These have been highly-complex, multi-stakeholder projects which have become industry leading benchmarks for user engagement.
